mapper.sql: id as id, odo_code as odoCode, store_code as storeCode, invoice_code as invoiceCode, invoice_date as invoiceDate, invoice_no as invoiceNo, payer as payer, item as item, qty as qty, unit_price as unitPrice, amt as amt, memo as memo, payee as payee, drawer as drawer, export_count as exportCount, export_batch as exportBatch, company as company, is_freight_invoice_sunder as isFreightInvoiceSunder, data_source as dataSource, ou_id as ouId, create_time as createTime, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, operator_id as operatorId, is_export as isExport
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_wh_invoice ( id, odo_code , store_code , invoice_code , invoice_date , invoice_no , payer , item , qty , unit_price , amt , memo , payee , drawer , export_count , export_batch , company , is_freight_invoice_sunder , data_source, ou_id , create_time , last_modify_time , operator_id , is_export ) VALUES ( #{id,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{odoCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{storeCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invoiceCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invoiceDate,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invoiceNo,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{payer,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{qty,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{unitPrice,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{amt,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{memo,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{payee,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{drawer,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{exportCount,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{exportBatch,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{company,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{isFreightInvoiceSunder,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , #{dataSource,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{ouId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{lastModifyTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{operatorId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{isExport,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_wh_invoice SET odo_code = #{odoCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , store_code = #{storeCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , invoice_code = #{invoiceCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , invoice_date = #{invoiceDate,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , invoice_no = #{invoiceNo,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , payer = #{payer,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , item = #{item,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , qty = #{qty,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , unit_price = #{unitPrice,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , amt = #{amt,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , memo = #{memo,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , payee = #{payee,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , drawer = #{drawer,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , export_count = #{exportCount,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , export_batch = #{exportBatch,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , company = #{company,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , is_freight_invoice_sunder = #{isFreightInvoiceSunder,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , data_source = #{dataSource,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , create_time = #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , last_modify_time = now() , operator_id = #{operatorId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , is_export = #{isExport,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} WHERE id = #{id} and ou_id = #{ouId}
mapper.select:
select from t_wh_invoice where id in
#{item}
